column4: hey. does anyone know a good video ripping software for Ubuntu?
I also need an editing software.
dvdrip for ripping dvds, kino i believe is a video editor
use kino, i think its in the repos
I need something that will edit .avi files. kino doesn't.
is there an ubuntu package out there of the program you are trying to install?
not that i know of.
what was it called again?
Open Movie Editor
did u try to install libsndfile-dev ?
I did.
there are no compatibility issues, flash and java thats about it
sudo apt-get install libsndfile1-dev
did u try that: sudo apt-get install libsndfile1-dev   it satisfies that programs libsndfile
I'm running it right now.
I still get that error.
i should upgrade to gusty. That might fix it.
yea, i keep forgetting im running gusty now, sorry to get ur hopes up
no problem. Now i just need to figure out how to upgrade.
gksu update-manager -c -d
compiling open movie editor now :)
lol... bastard.
